stanza.line: That you were once unkind befriends me (a)now(/a)
And for that sorrow which I then did (b)feel(/b)
Needs must I under my transgression (a)bow(/a)
Unless my nerves were brass or hammered (b)steel(/b)
For if you were by my unkindness (c)shaken(/c)
As I by yours y'have passed a hell of (d)time(/d)
And I a tyrant have no leisure (c)taken(/c)
To weigh how once I suffered in your (d)crime(/d)
O that our night of woe might have (e)remembered(/e)
My deepest sense how hard true sorrow (f)hits(/f)
And soon to you as you to me then (e)tendered(/e)
The humble salve which wounded bosoms (f)fits(/f)
But that your trespass now becomes a (g)fee(/g)
Mine ransoms yours and yours must ransom (g)me(/g)
